column4: this week i had to visit a homepage that had some info about my job. it required javascript, flash, shockwave and internet explorer. after reboot into xp and ie (which crashed when i first tried to enter the site) i found out that it used ALL THIS for displaying some plain text, some links and a few pdfs. HTML 3 can do that!
do you have the link of that homepage?
it requires a login. it's job related. but now i am way offtopic
to answer your first question, no. if you want to reconnect to it, add a bookmark
